participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emma is focused on her dreams and unafraid to pursue them.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city. i want to be a lawyer.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable, Jake enjoys spending time with friends and is always up for a good time.
participant_2.background: i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i do not like chicken.

content.text: I will go to the party
